message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $22,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is significantly below its value. I'm willing to come down to $19,000. This is my final offer, and I believe it's a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $19,000 is still above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.
